      • followUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/{followerId}/follow/{followeeId}",
                method={POST,GET},
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public void followUser​(@PathVariable("followerId")
                       long followerId,
                       @PathVariable("followeeId")
                       long followeeId)
        A mapping for following a user.
        Parameters:
        followerId - the one who is going to follow the followee
        followeeId - the one which is going to be followed by the follower
